references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of diffusion models, demonstrating their superiority over GANs in image generation.
This paper introduced the foundational mathematical framework for denoising diffusion probabilistic models.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of latent diffusion models, which significantly improved the efficiency and scalability of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced the text-guided diffusion model framework which significantly advanced the ability to control the generation process.

references.paper_title: All are worth words: A vit backbone for diffusion models
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the effectiveness of Vision Transformer backbones for diffusion models, which led to a significant improvement in performance.
